action.name: Glowing Sphere
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) damage in melee, or 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) damage at range, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Wyrd makes two attacks, both with its glowing spheres.

trait.name: Detect Life
entries: The wyrd can magically sense the presence of a living creature up to 5 miles away. He knows the general direction they are in but not their exact location.

monster.name: Living Statute, Rock/Ooze
languages: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The living statute, rock/ooze has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the living statute, rock/ooze remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a inanimate statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Living Statute made of rock/ooze makes three attacks on its turn: two with its squirts of grey ooze and one with its slam.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Grey Ooze Squirt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 2d4 - 1}) bludgeoning damage. Ignores targets' AC bonus granted by armor and shield. Any non-magical weapon or armor made of metal that is hit by the grey ooze corrodes. The weapon or armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to AC or damage for each successful attack. If the penalty drops the armor to 0 or the weapon damage to 0, respectively, the armor or weapon is destroyed.

Created by the Hutaakan civilization. These outwardly resemble normal rock living statues, but have the ability to conceal themselves by merging into the surface of a rock wall, floor or ceiling. In place of hot magma, rock/ooze statues are filled with grey ooze, and can squirt two blobs of ooze per round from their fingertips.
